questionTitle: I won't be able to help you ………………… you tell me what is wrong.
He should be in his office now …………………… he left early today.
………………… you come now, I am going to leave without you.
…………………. you don't stop smoking, you will fall seriously ill.
The robber threatened to shoot me …………….. I didn't give him the money.
………………. you leave at once, I will call the police.
………………… we miss the last bus, we will have to walk home.
……………. anyone has found my camera, would they please return it to me?
………………… Mark didn't skip his classes, he would achieve better grades.
She asked me ………………. I liked soccer.
